Title: Manuale d'amore 2 (Capitoli successivi)
Writer: Andrea Agnello, Ugo Chiti, Giovanni Veronesi
Actors: Carlo Verdone, Monica Bellucci, Riccardo Scamarcio, Fabio Volo
Plot: Four episodes. Nicola, paralyzed after a car crash, falls in love for his physiotherapist Lucia. Franco and Manuela, a young couple unfit to have child, fly to Barcelona for a specialized ...
